ABOUT

Meet the founder

Who?

We are a team of hard working people who believe that your web presence should be a unique representation of your business and personality. We are designers, programmers, and do-ers who will stop at nothing until you are satisfied.

What?

Rabbit Ears Design is a front end web development and design studio primarily geared toward small businesses. We build high quality websites that support client goals. Here at Rabbit Ears Design we specialize in using our creative design skills coupled with the knowledge of programming to create highly functional websites like look amazing and convert prospects into clients.

Why?

At Rabbit Ears Design, we focused on providing unique attention to our clients. We meet will meet with you to discuss your goals and help tailor a solution specifically to meet them.

We utilize design fundamentals to bring each project to life. We recognize that you may not know what you want from a website or you may already have a working site. Regardless of where you are in the process, we will assist in taking your dream and putting it on the screen!
